title: Number of nursery schools in the United Kingdom 2010 to 2019
summary: In general Number of schools has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of schools is slightly increasing from 2016/17 to 2017/18.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016/17 and 2017/18.
Maximum Number of schools, about 3.04 was reported at Year 2017/18
The lowest Number of schools, of value 3.02 was reported at Year 2016/17
min_summary: Overall Number of schools has increased over the Year.
Number of schools is slightly increasing from 2016/17 to 2017/18.
mid_summary: Overall Number of schools has increased over the Year.

The lowest Number of schools, of value 3.02 was reported at Year 2016/17
